simulator

Interface Choice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChoiceList, ChoiceListFlexi, ChoiceSingleton

    public interface Choice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkForErrors(State currentState, VarList varList)
      Check whether the transitions in this choice (from a particular state) would cause any errors, mainly variable overflows.
      void checkValid(ModelType modelType) 
      State computeTarget(int i, State currentState)
      Compute the target for the ith transition, based on a current state, returning the result as a new State object copied from the existing one.
      void computeTarget(int i, State currentState, State newState)
      Compute the target for the ith transition, based on a current state.
      int getIndexByProbabilitySum(double x)
      Return the index of a transition according to a probability (or rate) sum, x.
      java.lang.String getModuleOrAction()
      Get the module/action for this choice, as a string (form is "module" or "[action]")
      int getModuleOrActionIndex()
      Get the module/action for this choice, as an integer index (-i for independent in ith module, i for synchronous on ith action) (in both cases, modules/actions are 1-indexed)
      double getProbability(int i)
      Get the probability/rate for the ith transition.
      double getProbabilitySum()
      Get the sum of probabilities/rates for all transitions.
      java.lang.String getUpdateString(int i, State currentState)
      Get the updates of the ith transition, as a string.
      java.lang.String getUpdateStringFull(int i)
      Get the updates of the ith transition, as a string.
      void scaleProbabilitiesBy(double d)
      Scale probability/rate of all transitions, multiplying by d.
      int size()
      Get the number of transitions in this choice.

    • Method Detail

      • scaleProbabilitiesBy

        void scaleProbabilitiesBy(double d)
        Scale probability/rate of all transitions, multiplying by d.

      • getModuleOrActionIndex

        int getModuleOrActionIndex()
        Get the module/action for this choice, as an integer index (-i for independent in ith module, i for synchronous on ith action) (in both cases, modules/actions are 1-indexed)

      • getModuleOrAction

        java.lang.String getModuleOrAction()
        Get the module/action for this choice, as a string (form is "module" or "[action]")

      • size

        int size()
        Get the number of transitions in this choice.

      • getUpdateString

        java.lang.String getUpdateString(int i,
                                 State currentState)
                          throws PrismLangException
        Get the updates of the ith transition, as a string. This is in abbreviated form, i.e. x'=1, rather than x'=x+1. Format is: x'=1, y'=0, with empty string for empty update. Only variables updated are included in list (even if unchanged).
        Throws:
        PrismLangException

      • getUpdateStringFull

        java.lang.String getUpdateStringFull(int i)
        Get the updates of the ith transition, as a string. This is in full, i.e. of the form x'=x+1, rather than x'=1. Format is: (x'=x+1) & (y'=y-1), with empty string for empty update. Only variables updated are included in list. Note that expressions may have been simplified from original model.

      • computeTarget

        State computeTarget(int i,
                    State currentState)
             throws PrismLangException
        Compute the target for the ith transition, based on a current state, returning the result as a new State object copied from the existing one.
        Throws:
        PrismLangException

      • computeTarget

        void computeTarget(int i,
                   State currentState,
                   State newState)
            throws PrismLangException
        Compute the target for the ith transition, based on a current state. Apply changes in variables to a provided copy of the State object. (i.e. currentState and newState should be equal when passed in.)
        Throws:
        PrismLangException

      • getProbability

        double getProbability(int i)
        Get the probability/rate for the ith transition.

      • getProbabilitySum

        double getProbabilitySum()
        Get the sum of probabilities/rates for all transitions.

      • getIndexByProbabilitySum

        int getIndexByProbabilitySum(double x)
        Return the index of a transition according to a probability (or rate) sum, x. i.e. return the index of the first transition in this choice for which the sum of probabilities/rates for that and all prior transitions exceeds x.

      • checkValid

        void checkValid(ModelType modelType)
         throws PrismException
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • checkForErrors

        void checkForErrors(State currentState,
                    VarList varList)
             throws PrismException
        Check whether the transitions in this choice (from a particular state) would cause any errors, mainly variable overflows. Variable ranges are specified in the passed in VarList. Throws an exception if such an error occurs.
        Throws:
        PrismException
